#summary Instructions how to build from source and make a release

Prepare the release:
  # Increase Bundle-Version in META-INF/MANIFEST.MF

Build/export the plug-in:
  # Select "Export..." in context menu of the project
  # Select "Deployable plug-ins and features"
  # Click "Next >"
  # Enter directory to export the plug-in
  # Click "Finish"

Release the new version of the plug-in:
  # Upload the new release to [http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-printers/downloads/list the download page] and label it as "Featured"
  # Replace the "Featured" label of the previous release by "Deprecated"
  # Update RecentChanges on the wiki
  # Update the plug-in details at [http://www.eclipseplugincentral.com/Web_Links-index-req-viewlink-cid-962.html Eclipse Plug-in Central]
